EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello, {{Lead.First Name}},
Your use case “Unification cloud for financial services” is ready to download.
Move to implementation of your unification cloud with more knowledge based on what others have learned along the way. Then let Nokia show you how to unify your entire IT environment to yield consistent and efficient operations globally. Download use case <[[https://networks.nokia.com/use-case/financial-services/unification-cloud]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Terms of Use <[[{{my.Terms}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
